item.title: programming in doom emacs
item.description: This is how I use doom emacs for daily coding. Doom and it’s packages are working together to make developer’s life easy. Here I made a complete list for you guys. This is a step by step guide to do coding on doom emacs. By the way when I say things like C-c C-p it means CTRL + c + p before we start to make things work enable specified modules in your init file
